file_content.text: See you around, Lieutenant.
Lieutenant! I'm with the SIS. What is your status? Do you require medical attention?
My medic here has me covered, thanks.
No, I'm fine.
No, I'm fine.
Excellent. We'll get straight to work then.
Did Jonas send you?
Why are you here?
Yes, that's correct.
Backup is pretty useless now, the fighting's over.
You're a little late.
Yes, yes, I can see that. This place looks like a war zone.
We're here to clean up the mess, make sure there's nothing useful to be recovered. Nice work, by the way.
Jonas is waiting for you inside the Republic Embassy, up on the Promenade. He asked that you meet him there for a debriefing.
I'll head for the embassy right away.
Understood.
I guess I'm done.
Yeah, I'd definitely say so.
Glad I got a chance to meet you, Lieutenant. And again--nice work.
You've got to be kidding.
Well, I'm definitely impressed, if that means anything. I'm sure Jonas is just waiting to congratulate you in person.
Anyways, I won't hold you up any longer. And again--great work down here.
Sweepers, fan out! Standard grid formation....
Can't talk. Sorry.
